PrecisEnactment of the CANADA-NOVA SCOTIA OIL AND GAS SPILLS AND DEBRIS LIABILITY REGULATIONS which prescribe the amount of $30 million as the limit of absolute liability in respect of a spill or debris resulting from oil and gas exploration or production in the Nova Scotia offshore area.
